body_html: I don't think this is just an alias of def shape(..) since get_shape() returns the value through shape inference without running the graph; this is pretty close to the code that should be fixed for #4226 so hopefully this can be resolved in the same pass.

body: I don't think this is just an alias of def shape(..) since get_shape() returns the value through shape inference without running the graph; this is pretty close to the code that should be fixed for #4226 so hopefully this can be resolved in the same pass.
